title: Mageia 4 dual DVD
description:
Right on time, and just in time for the first day of FOSDEM 2014, we have the great pleasure of announcing Mageia 4. We're still having a grand time doing this together, and we hope you enjoy this release as much as we've enjoyed making it.

Major new features
* Updates to RPM (4.11) and urpmi, which has been given a thorough Mageia turnout and cleanup
* Kernel 3.12
* systemd 208
* GRUB is the default bootloader; GRUB2 is available to test.
* Revamped package groupings for installation and rpmdrake
* KDE 4.11
* GNOME 3.10
* Xfce 4.10
* LibreOffice 4.1.3.2
* Experimental UEFI Support
* FullHD+ resolution support

You can read more @ http://blog.mageia.org/en/2014/02/01/new-year-new-resolutions-and-a-new-mageia-heres-mageia-4
